messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Please put the grep back.  You have to say BUG, once, to get counted as bug.
Counting all the times the lower case 'bug' appears will overcount.

In the shell script,
// $G $D/$F.dir/one.go && $G $D/$F.dir/two.go
should be
// $G $D/$F.dir/one.go && $G $D/$F.dir/two.go || echo BUG: bug434

Russ

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7e0de11af7ae ***

cmd/gc: test for issue 3552

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6128051

subject: code review 6128051: cmd/gc: test for issue 3552
